name: TeamCarbonXtreme
body:
### Hello, welcome to the website of *TeamCarbonXtremeROM*

## ¿What is CXR?
CXR (CarbonXtreme) is a more optimized Android ROM based on CM, AOSP and a little touch of PAC- ROM.

## History of CXR
CXR born how a free project between 4 guys interested in Android, we are a small group of guys, with basic knowledge of Android, currently still working to bring a new ROM to the world of Android, bringing more stability, support those devices that do not have with support from other developers

We had our first supported devices, Galaxy Ace i (cooperve) Galaxy Ace (cooper), etc. We currently have over current devices, Moto E, G Moto, Moto G 2014, S3, etc...

## Supported devices
- Moto E
- Moto G
- Moto G 2014
- Moto X
- Samsung Galaxy S3
- Samsung Galaxy S3 mini
- Samsung Galaxy Grand Neo
- Huawei Ascend Y300

## CarbonXtremeROM Team 
* ROM-PacMe : [Github] (https://github.com/ROM-PacMe)
* Nothing-Dev: [Github] (https://github.com/Nothing-Dev)
* Krizthian: [Github] (https://github.com/Krizthian)
* Franco-Tomas: ***Nothing***
* Ander-Alvarez: [Github] (https://github.com/Ander-Alvarez)
* Jefer94: [Github] (https://github.com/jefer94)
* NoelMacwan: [Github] (https://github.com/NoelMacwan)

## Information
We are currently working from Android 5.1 onwards, our source is still at work.

## Support or Contact
- [Email] (carbonxtremerom@hotmail.com)
- [Facebook] (https://www.facebook.com/pages/Team-CarbonXtreme/1443342595940983?ref=ts&fref=ts)
- Jenkins: WIP

Thanks to all who support us.

Thanks to:
- Google for Android
- CyanogenMod
- PAC-man
- Qualcomm
- Broadcom
- Samsung Exynos

## And especially you, for making all this possible.
